lead_paragraph: Vladimir Tarasenko's 37th goal midway through the third period was the go-ahead score for the St. Louis Blues, who scored five straight goals in a 5-2 victory over the Arizona Coyotes on Monday night to tie for first place in the Western Conference.

headline.print_headline: Blues Rally From 2 Down, Whip Coyotes 5-2
headline.main: Blues Rally From 2 Down, Whip Coyotes 5-2
